name: Endless Tank War!
description: Play the new, highly updated version of Endless Tank War on Kongregate: http://www.kongregate.com/games/polydus/endless-tank-war/. This version was made for #KenneyJam and therefore not finished. Visit polydus.com for more games by me, or follow me on twitter at @Polydus. If the text looks weird, reload the page!
